Name: NARRATOR
Text: You are dreaming of the police and protesters being cut down.

Name: NARRATOR
Text: They are screaming in pain but you cannot hear anything.

Name: NARRATOR
Text: Some are scattered around the forest, some left standing like stumps.

Name: NARRATOR
Text: An owl flies down to grab something. You can't really make out what it is.

Name: NARRATOR
Text: You wake up to your doorbell ringing.
